data: “Dock and me went out this mornin' and scraped up about three tablespoonfuls o' frost offen that plank a layin' right thar by the fence,—yes, sir, three tablespoonfuls, nigh about.”
The Tobacco Tiller: A Tale of the Kentucky Tobacco Fields
